title: Old Team builder, we miss you!
body:
Riot, your making me cry here.
why you do dis to me?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

I'm gonna be quitting till it comes back.
(anyone else feel free to join in protest with me)

replies.body: yeah, miss those 30 minute queus trying to find a support. Bye, you won't be missed. By the way, it's you're.

> [{quoted}](name=Tobi Only Sways,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PrXTvWOt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-15T06:47:53.502+0000)
>
> yeah, miss those 30 minute queus trying to find a support. Bye, you won't be missed. By the way, it's you're.

Some of us were the support and got to cherry pick the teams we wanted to play.

> [{quoted}](name=sheldonbunny,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PrXTvWOt,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-15T07:37:09.056+0000)
>
> Some of us were the support and got to cherry pick the teams we wanted to play.

yeah, the minority. Making it unfun for the majority of the players trying to play. Stay salty, now no more "cherry picking" for you :).

I don't think a majority of players minded that much if they were willing to wait that long. And it's not like you can't queue up as a support yourself if it makes you salty waiting or you can go play a different game mode. The whole point of Team Builder was so you could BUILD your TEAM, so I think you missed its point. But whatever. Enjoy your new "solo queue" against 5 man teams with good coordination against you and the other 4 solos.

> [{quoted}](name=Tobi Only Sways,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PrXTvWOt,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-15T07:58:27.780+0000)
>
> yeah, the minority. Making it unfun for the majority of the players trying to play. Stay salty, now no more "cherry picking" for you :).

Unless you're pouring a salt shaker on me, i'm salt free, sir. XD

And sorry, but my queue times on the new champ select are practically instantaneous , so I still get fast games.  Got to love being a support main.  Kappa

What, exactly, did you like about team builder?

Because they're not gonna bring it back. But maybe you can make the new champ select better by airing your grievances, instead of just going 'I don't like new! Bring back old!'

Yeah, long wait times varying on role day to day was really great. Normally? waiting on a support. New champion comes out? every other role is impossible to find. Oh and the matchmaking was just amazing, always getting placed with random Elos, which was commonly brought up here before lol. Now everyone misses it because something came out that's much better and more streamlined, with more ways to get you into game faster
Have fun never playing League again then.
